    public class DebtActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements com.codetroopers.betterpickers.calendardatepicker.CalendarDatePickerDialogFragment.OnDateSetListener, com.codetroopers.betterpickers.radialtimepicker.RadialTimePickerDialogFragment.OnTimeSetListener
    Activity for adding or editing a new debt This activity is launched after clicking the floating plus button
    Author:
    Petr Kubes
